amendment.description: An amendment numbered 36 printed in House Report 118-158 to prevent the VA from interfering with a veteran's ability to participate in a legal state medical cannabis program, deny service to such a veteran, or limit health care providers' ability to make appropriate recommendations of this treatment option for veterans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mast amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Mast.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mast amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
